name: AbsoluteValue.hasBasis_uniformity
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedField 𝕜
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : CommRing R
abv : AbsoluteValue R 𝕜
⊢ (uniformity R).HasBasis (fun x => LT.lt 0 x) fun ε => setOf fun p => LT.lt (abv (HSub.hSub p.2 p.1)) ε
decl:
theorem hasBasis_uniformity :
    𝓤[abv.uniformSpace].HasBasis ((0 : 𝕜) < ·) fun ε => { p : R × R | abv (p.2 - p.1) < ε } :=
  UniformSpace.hasBasis_ofFun (exists_gt _) _ _ _ _ _
